title: BB&T Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for BBT - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of BB&T Corp. (Symbol: BBT) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $48.57, changing hands as high as $48.96 per share. BB&T Corp. shares are currently trading up about 3.2% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BBT shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
